backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods or logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping three UI/theme features to involved files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Short descriptions of key frontend files including App.tsx, index.css, and Tailwind config.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer overrides defining extensive OKLCH color variables for light/dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that sets up root element and loads the React main.tsx script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: React component showing the large multi-line headline and a labeled code input with footer attribution.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and refreshes a backend actor using react-query based on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity auth context and provider handling login, stored identity, and state transitions.
frontend/src/index.css: Global styles establishing terminal‑green OKLCH theme plus smoothing and font settings.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React entry file setting up providers and rendering App with Tailwind styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config extending theme colors, fonts, radii, and animations using OKLCH variables.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project state, existing features, and pending feature request AR‑1.
